inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient reports that at the time of his initial diagnosis with type 1 diabetes he was hospitalized with a glucose value >1000 mg/dL.

inclusion.criterion: previous admission for DKA in any facility within the prior 2 years
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: He has had previous episodes of diabetic ketoacidosis, for which he was hospitalized.

inclusion.criterion: meets criteria for DKA at time of admission
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: willing to participate in the study protocol
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient states that he is willing to participate in the study.

exclusion.criterion: end stage renal disease on dialysis
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 24-year-old man with type 1 diabetes who has had previous episodes of diabetic ketoacidosis. He is willing to participate in the study.
